name: checkWeather
utterances: Can you please tell me the weather of [whichCity](Tehran).
What is the weather like in [whichCity](New York) [when](next Friday)?
How is the weather in [whichCity](Barcelona) [when](on April 15th)?
What is the weather like in [whichCity](Seattle) [when](right now)?
What is the [when](current) weather like in [whichCity](Berlin)?
In [whichCity](Utrecht), how hot is it [when](on wednesday)?
How many degrees are there [when](now) in [whichCity](Prague)?
